name: Password Manager
description: A lightweight terminal-based password manager for local credential storage using Java and Base64 encoding.

name: Mp3 Player
description: A minimalist Python music player that automatically streams MP3s from a local directory for a focused lofi experience.

name: Technical Writeups & Retrospectives
description: A centralized collection of technical resources, custom scripts, and performance retrospectives from my cyber defense and programming competitions.

name: Scoundrel Game
description: Scoundrel is a terminal-based Python implementation of the classic solo dungeon-crawling card game.

name: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website built with Flask to showcase my projects and skills in cybersecurity and programming.
